name: Atom's Glitch
description:
Ever hear of an atom glitching before? No? Me neither? And this little guy is why. He run's around all day collecting atoms that are glitching or on the verge of glitching. What a wonderous little fella he is.

---

Controls are simple.

Arrow Keys or WASD to move.

W, Up Arrow or Space to Jump.

---

Note:

Only the first level is complete.
